sex.description: The person's gender. '1' means male, '0' means female.

cp.description: What kind of chest pain the person felt. '0' means typical pain, '1' means unusual pain, '2' means pain not related to heart, '3' means no pain.

trtbps.description: The person's blood pressure when they are resting.

chol.description: The amount of fat in the blood.

fbs.description: Whether the person's blood sugar is more than 120 mg/dl after not eating for a while. '1' means yes, '0' means no.

restecg.description: The result of a test that checks the heart's electrical signals when resting. '0' means normal, '1' means there's an issue, '2' means the heart might have a problem.

thalachh.description: The highest heart rate the person reached during activity.

exng.description: Whether the person gets chest pain while exercising. '1' means yes, '0' means no.

oldpeak.description: How much the heart's electrical signals change during activity compared to resting.

slp.full_name: Slope of the peak exercise ST segment
slp.description: How the heart's electrical signals change during exercise. '0' means the signals go down, '1' means they stay flat, '2' means they go up.

caa.description: How many main blood vessels around the heart are blocked or narrowed. '0' means no problem, '1' means one vessel is affected, and so on.

thall.description: A type of blood cell problem. '0' means normal, '1' means permanent problem, '2' means problem could improve.
